definition: diamond/also called 鑽石|钻石[zuan4 shi2]
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: There are only four regions in the world where huge reserves of diamond are found.
sentences.chinese: 世界上只有四个地区被人发现有大量金刚石。

sentences.english: There's a temple in the middle of Hanoi.
sentences.chinese: 在这个寺庙内有三个非常大的金刚石柱子。

sentences.english: And yet pure iron is scarcer than gold or diamonds.
sentences.chinese: 然而纯铁比黄金或金刚石还罕见。

sentences.english: In this paper analysis is made on the defects of present diamond dry cutting wheels.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了目前风冷式金刚石干切片存在的缺陷。

sentences.english: All other metals and nonmetals lie within the boundaries of lead and diamond.
sentences.chinese: 所有其他金属和非金属都处在铅和金刚石的界限之内。

sentences.english: It can be predicted that water-based nano-diamond polishing slurry will gain more attention and applications.
sentences.chinese: 水基纳米金刚石抛光液可能是未来抛光液的发展方向。

sentences.english: Electroplating process in holes is a new technique for precise diamond reamer manufacturing.
sentences.chinese: 内镀工艺是一种新的精密金刚石铰刀的制造方法。

sentences.english: This process eventually leads to nano-crystalline diamond structures.
sentences.chinese: 最后，这种方法会形成纳米晶金刚石结构。

sentences.english: The weakening of the diamond tool matrix performance was studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了金刚石工具胎体材料的性能“弱化”问题。

sentences.english: The investigation of diamond becomes the focus of the physics and chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 对金刚石的研究已成为物理和化学界的研究热点。

sentences.english: Experienced diamond miners can tell a diamond immediately.
sentences.chinese: 有经验的金刚石开采者以立即人辨出金刚石。

sentences.english: Experienced diamond miners can tell a diamond immediately.
sentences.chinese: 有经验的金刚石开采者以立即人辨出金刚石。

sentences.english: The electron field emission from nanocrystalline diamond films on different substrate materials was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了不同衬底上纳米金刚石膜场电子发射性质。

sentences.english: Mutations are exclusively available to owners of "The Passing" DLC.
sentences.chinese: 突变是专门提供给业主的“过”类金刚石。

sentences.english: Structure of artificial diamond bit tool influenced efficiency cutting rock. Trapezoidal laminal bit tool was adopted.
sentences.chinese: 金刚石碎岩刀头的结构影响着碎岩工具的加工效率。

sentences.english: High quality diamond thin films were grown by hot-filament chemical vapor deposition.
sentences.chinese: 采用热丝化学气相沉积生长出优异的金刚石薄膜。

definition: rutile (mineral form of titanium oxide TiO2)
zircon (colored crystal of zirconium silicate ZrSiO4)
